Trigger.name: Curio Organizer Start
Trigger.script:
--create a table to organize all your curios CurioTable = {} CurioTable.Collections = {} --these are adjustable values as your curio output may not be the same inside Lusternia --this is the number of characters from the beginning of Set to the beginning of Collection CurioTable.SetLength = 21 --this is the number of characters from the beginning of Collection to the beginning of Description CurioTable.CollectionLength = 13
--enable the triggers that will read, autosend "more", and output the results enableTrigger("Curio Organizer More") enableTrigger("Curio Organizer Spotter") enableTrigger("Curio Organizer Display")
